001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003import com.technototes.library.general.Enablable;
004import com.technototes.library.general.Periodic;
005import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
006
007/** Interface for objects that behave as sticks
008 * @author Alex Stedman
009 */
010public interface Stick extends Periodic, Enablable<Stick> {
011    /** Return x axis double
012     *
013     * @return The double
014     */
015    double getXAxis();
016    /** Return y axis double
017     *
018     * @return The double
019     */
020    double getYAxis();
021
022    /** Return x axis supplier
023     *
024     * @return The double supplier
025     */
026    default DoubleSupplier getXSupplier() {
027        return this::getXAxis;
028    }
029
030    /** Return y axis supplier
031     *
032     * @return The double supplier
033     */
034    default DoubleSupplier getYSupplier() {
035        return this::getYAxis;
036    }
037
038    /** Returns the angle of the stick
039     *
040     * @return The angle
041     */
042    default double getAngle() {
043        return -Math.atan2(getYAxis(), getXAxis());
044    }
045
046    /** Returns the stick's distance from the center
047     *
048     * @return The distance
049     */
050    default double getDistanceFromCenter() {
051        return Math.sqrt(getXAxis() * getXAxis() + getYAxis() * getYAxis());
052    }
053}
